record.title: ORDERS FOR TUESDAY, DECEMBER 9, 2008
record.narrative:
ORDERS FOR TUESDAY, DECEMBER 9, 2008 -- (Senate - December 08, 2008)

[Page: S10819]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that when the Senate completes its business today, it stand adjourned until 10:30 a.m. tomorrow, Tuesday, December 9; that following the prayer and pledge, the Journal of proceedings be approved to date, that the morning hour be deemed expired, that the time for the two leaders be reserved for their use later in the day, and that the Senate proceed to a period of morning business until 12 noon, with Senators permitted to speak for up to 10 minutes each, and that following morning business the Senate resume the motion to proceed to S. 3297.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
